channel.title: Something is wrong with my Mining code

item.title: Something is wrong with my Mining code
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:8, topic:287096”] public void JailMining() { if(playerHasItem(1267,1)) { if(playerHasItem(439,10000)) { toX = 1; toY = 1; sM("You have been sent back to home"); } else { sM("You have been given a pickaxe."); addItem(1267,1); } } }
I took the liberty of making it more readable :p[/quote]

Nice conventions.

Read full topic
item.source: Something is wrong with my Mining code

item.title: Something is wrong with my Mining code
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

[quote=“RSPServer, post:9, topic:287096”][quote author=Hidendra link=topic=379670.msg2854701#msg2854701 date=1246760030]

	public void JailMining() {
		if(playerHasItem(1267,1)) {
			if(playerHasItem(439,10000)) {
				toX = 1;
				toY = 1;
				sM("You have been sent back to home");
			} else {
				sM("You have been given a pickaxe.");
				addItem(1267,1);
			}
		}
	}

I took the liberty of making it more readable
[/quote]

That works thanks![/quote]

Sorry to drag this on, but why give them a pickaxe if they already have one?

Read full topic

item.title: Something is wrong with my Mining code
item.dc:creator: @RSPServer RSPServer
item.description:
@RSPServer wrote:

Ok now more errors:

code:

public void JailMining() { if(playerHasItem(1267,1)) { if(playerHasItem(439,10000)) { toX = 1; toY = 1; sM("You have been sent back to home"); else if sM("You have been given a tin ore. You need 10000 tin ore to be releaced"); addItem(439,1); } else if sM("You have been given a pickaxe."); addItem(1267,1); } }

error report:

client.java:300: 'else' without 'if' else if ^ client.java:300: '(' expected else if ^ client.java:301: ')' expected sM("You have been given a tin ore. You need 10000 tin ore to be releaced"); ^ client.java:304: '(' expected else if sM("You have been given a pickaxe."); addItem(1267,1); ^ client.java:304: ')' expected else if sM("You have been given a pickaxe."); addItem(1267,1); ^ 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Something is wrong with my Mining code
item.dc:creator: @RSPServer RSPServer
item.description:
@RSPServer wrote:

Natey:

Just add an “if” and that’s harsh, 10k tin ore, make it 250 or 500…

just testing lol

Like this:


public void JailMining() {
if(playerHasItem(1267,1)) {
 if(playerHasItem(439,10000)) {
  toX = 1;
  toY = 1;
  sM("You have been sent back to home");
  else if
  sM("You have been given a tin ore. You need 10000 tin ore to be releaced");
  addItem(439,1);
  }
else
 sM("You have been given a pickaxe.");
 addItem(1267,1);
}
}

New Error

client.java:300: 'else' without 'if'
  else if
  ^
client.java:300: '(' expected
  else if
         ^
client.java:301: ')' expected
  sM("You have been given a tin ore. You need 10000 tin ore to be releaced");
                                                                            ^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Something is wrong with my Mining code
item.dc:creator: @RSPServer RSPServer
item.description:
@RSPServer wrote:

Code:

public void JailMining() { if(playerHasItem(1267,1)) { if(playerHasItem(439,10000)) { toX = 1; toY = 1; sM("You have been sent back to home"); else sM("You have been given a tin ore. You need 10000 tin ore to be releaced"); addItem(439,1); } else sM("You have been given a pickaxe."); addItem(1267,1); } }

Error:

client.java:300: 'else' without 'if' else ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Why does there need to be a else if??? I have else!
